title: To-Do List
description: This project provided hands-on experience with JavaScript, including event handling, callbacks, and implementing basic CRUD functionalities.

title: Food Much - Online Restro App
description: Through this project, I gained in-depth knowledge of HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, focusing on building responsive layouts and handling components seamlessly.

title: CDAC - Alumni Association Portal
description: As part of a team of four, I developed an Alumni Association Portal during my C-DAC that allows admins and alumni to post jobs and assist job-seeking alumni through referrals.
